meanings.definition: spugs (noun): a type of small bird
meanings.sent1: The colorful spugs chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent2: I saw a spugs flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the spugs but failed.
meanings.sent4: The spugs darted through the branches like a tiny arrow.
meanings.sent5: The spugs' melodious song filled the forest with joy.

meanings.definition: spugs (verb): to move quickly and suddenly
meanings.sent1: The squirrel spugs across the yard to hide its acorn.
meanings.sent2: I spugs out of the way just in time to avoid the falling branch.
meanings.sent3: The children spugs around the playground, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: Time spugs by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The rabbit spugs into its burrow at the first sign of danger.

meanings.definition: spugs (adjective): describing something small and agile
meanings.sent1: The spugs kitten leaped playfully after the toy.
meanings.sent2: The spugs puppy raced around the room with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The spugs squirrel quickly climbed up the tree to safety.
meanings.sent4: Her spugs fingers moved swiftly over the piano keys.
meanings.sent5: The spugs cheetah effortlessly outran its prey.
